verses.verse: So I <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H7200>considered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6217>oppressions<s%> that are <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun:<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> the <S%H1832>tears<s%> of such as were <S%H6231>oppressed,<s%> and they had <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5162>comforter;<s%> and on the <S%H3027>side<s%> of their <S%H6231>oppressors<s%> there was <S%H3581>power;<s%> but they had <S%H369>no<s%> comforter.

Why I <S%H7623>praised<s%> the <S%H4191>dead<s%> which are <S%H3528>already<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H4481>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H5728>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive.<s%>

Yes, <S%H2896>better<s%> is he than <S%H8147>both<s%> they, <S%H834>which<s%> has not <S%H5728>yet<s%> <S%H1961>been,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has not <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> that is <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

Again, I <S%H7200>considered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5999>travail,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3788>right<s%> <S%H4639>work,<s%> that for <S%H1931>this<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H7068>envied<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7469>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
The <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H2263>folds<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> together, and <S%H398>eats<s%> his own <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

<S%H2896>Better<s%> is an <S%H4393>handful<s%> <S%H3709><s%> with <S%H5183>quietness,<s%> than both the <S%H2651>hands<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> with <S%H5999>travail<s%> and <S%H7469>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>

There is <S%H259>one<s%> alone, and there is not a <S%H8145>second;<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> he has <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H1121>child<s%> nor <S%H251>brother:<s%> yet is there <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5999>labor;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is his <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H6239>riches;<s%> neither said he, For <S%H4310>whom<s%> do I <S%H6001>labor,<s%> and <S%H2637>bereave<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> of <S%H2896>good?<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> yes, it is a <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H6045>travail.<s%>
<S%H8147>Two<s%> are <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H259>one;<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they <S%H3426>have<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7939>reward<s%> for their <S%H5999>labor.<s%>

For <S%H518>if<s%> they <S%H5307>fall,<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> will <S%H6965>lift<s%> up his <S%H2270>fellow:<s%> but <S%H337>woe<s%> to him that is <S%H259>alone<s%> when he <S%H5307>falls;<s%> for he has not <S%H8145>another<s%> to <S%H6965>help<s%> him up.
<S%H1571>Again,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> together, then they have <S%H2552>heat:<s%> but <S%H349>how<s%> can <S%H259>one<s%> be <S%H3179>warm<s%> alone?

And <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8630>prevail<s%> against him, <S%H8147>two<s%> shall <S%H5975>withstand<s%> him; and a <S%H8027>threefold<s%> <S%H2339>cord<s%> is not <S%H4120>quickly<s%> <S%H5423>broken.<s%>

<S%H2896>Better<s%> is a <S%H4542>poor<s%> and a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3206>child<s%> than an <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3045>will<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H2094>admonished.<s%>

For out of <S%H1004>prison<s%> <S%H612><s%> he <S%H3318>comes<s%> to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> <S%H3588>whereas<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> he that is <S%H3205>born<s%> in his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> becomes <S%H7326>poor.<s%>

I <S%H7200>considered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> which <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> with the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3206>child<s%> that shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> up in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even of <S%H3605>all<s%> that have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them: they <S%H1571>also<s%> that <S%H314>come<s%> <S%H314>after<s%> shall not <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in him. <S%H3588>Surely<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7475>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
